about_the_game:
"Stay Up!" is a game where you use your spear to eliminate enemies while avoiding walls and adversaries.

Attacking with your spear also propels your character into the air. Try to stay airborne by continuously attacking, but be careful not to hit the ceiling by launching too many attacks. Use the dash ability to avoid hitting the ceiling and to evade enemies.

By dashing, you can pass through enemies and avoid taking damage.

Engage in battles by throwing your spear at unique enemies with varying strengths. Each spear throw will also lift you into the air. Be cautious not to collide with enemies or walls! Remember that you have a limited number of lives against each enemy. In this game, where you start your adventure again when defeated, your most significant weapons will be your spear and your combat tactics.

Gameplay and Features:

  • Unique enemy designs.
  • Minimalistic and fluid combat mechanics.
  • Immersive sound and visual effects.
  • Art themes that vary by levels.

"Stay Up!" is a game where you use your spear to eliminate enemies while avoiding walls and adversaries.

Attacking with your spear also propels your character into the air. Try to stay airborne by continuously attacking, but be careful not to hit the ceiling by launching too many attacks. Use the dash ability to avoid hitting the ceiling and to evade enemies.

By dashing, you can pass through enemies and avoid taking damage.

Engage in battles by throwing your spear at unique enemies with varying strengths. Each spear throw will also lift you into the air. Be cautious not to collide with enemies or walls! Remember that you have a limited number of lives against each enemy. In this game, where you start your adventure again when defeated, your most significant weapons will be your spear and your combat tactics.

Gameplay and Features:

name: Stay Up!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

short_description: Stay Up is a 2D roguelike, boss rush game. If you want to feel the feeling of challenge; Take your spear, avoid hitting the walls and defeat the enemies! When you throw your spear you will jump! Avoid hitting the ground using this, but be careful not to hit the ceiling either!
